Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some 95th-bound Red Line trains are operating w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some 95th-bound Red Line trains are operating with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
